wikipedia_page.main: John Philip Davey (born 29 December 1964) is an English former competition swimmer.

link_mentions.page: The Blue Coat School, Oldham
response: * John Davey (born 29 December 1964), former British Olympic swimmer. At the 1982 Commonwealth Games in Brisbane, Australia, he won bronze medals in both the 400 m freestyle and 400 m individual medley. He also competed at the Olympics in Seoul (1988) and in Barcelona (1992).
